Title: The Batman
Notes: New episodes aired on Kids ' WB !

Title: Batman Beyond
Notes: Previously broadcast on Kids ' WB ! . Reruns aired on Hub Network

Title: Batman : The Animated Series
Notes: Previously broadcast on Fox Kids and Kids ' WB ! . Reruns aired on Hub Network

Title: Beware the Batman
Notes: Premiered the night of May 10 , 2014 . New episodes began airing on July 27 with episode 12 . The series was put in turnaround on September 22 , 2014 , which forced Toonami to air the remaining episodes in an early morning marathon on September 28 , 2014

Title: Cartoon Roulette
Notes: Roulette was composed of animated action shorts ; included were Space Ghost , Superman ( 1940s ) , Birdman and the Galaxy Trio , The Herculoids , Shazzan , The Impossibles , Teen Force , and Mighty Mightor

Title: Fantastic Four : World 's Greatest Heroes
Notes: Moved to Cartoon Network Saturday mornings , then to Nicktoons

Title: G.I . Joe
Notes: The 1980s series began airing on Cartoon Network in July 2002 , but officially became a Toonami exclusive in November 2002 . Reruns aired on Hub Network and Discovery Family

Title: He-Man and the Masters of the Universe
Jackie Chan Adventures
Notes: Originally a part of Kids ' WB . Aired on Toonami as a filler . Reruns have aired on Disney XD

Title: Justice League Unlimited
Notes: Sequel series to Justice League . Later heavily edited on Vortexx

Title: Megas XLR
Notes: Aired all episodes on Toonami except for a single episode , which aired on Miguzi . Aired on Toonami Jetstream

Title: The Powerpuff Girls ( 1998 series )
Notes: A Cartoon Network original series . Formerly aired on the revived version of Cartoon Planet and Boomerang

Title: The Real Adventures of Jonny Quest
Notes: Originally on TBS , TNT , and Cartoon Network , it became a Toonami exclusive on launch

Title: ReBoot
Notes: Originally on ABC . The third and fourth seasons were Toonami-exclusives in the US

Title: Samurai Jack
Notes: Aired very few episodes on Toonami , including the premieres of the last four episodes . Aired on Toonami Jetstream in its entirety . Was the final program to air on the old Toonami . The series returned to Toonami in February 2014 , after FLCL ended its second run . Previously aired on Boomerang . Season 5 premiered on Adult Swim in 2017

Title: Star Wars : The Clone Wars
Notes: Premiered August 17 , 2013 at 3am/2c . First 56 episodes aired on the block . Episode 8 , titled Bombad Jedi , was skipped during the program 's run
